name: Transmit Exported Favorites File
summary: Learn about .EXPORTEDFAVORITES files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can export favorites by choosing Favorites → Export.... To import favorites from an EXPORTEDFAVORITES file, choose Favorites → Import from → Transmit....

description: File created by Transmit, an FTP and SFTP program for Mac; saves the user's exported favorites (remote logins) in an encrypted, proprietary format so that the file protects sensitive login information; can be imported into another Transmit copy to transfer the favorites.
